trans-unit.source: Plugin to provide a front-end form for departments to rate partners.
trans-unit.target: Plugin zur Bereitstellung eines Frontend-Formulars f√ºr Abteilungen zur Bewertung von Partnern.

trans-unit.source: Include Bootstrap from CDN:If this option is "true" then Bootstrap 5 will be included via CDN from jsDelivr. This option should only be used for testing purposes. If you want to use Bootstrap 5 (the default framework of the Partner Rating template) for rendering, it is recommended to include it yourself via your site package and leave this option disabled.
trans-unit.target: Include Bootstrap from CDN:If this option is "true" then Bootstrap 5 will be included via CDN from jsDelivr. This option should only be used for testing purposes. If you want to use Bootstrap 5 (the default framework of the Partner Rating template) for rendering, it is recommended to include it yourself via your site package and leave this option disabled.

trans-unit.source: Path to CSS file (FE):CSS file that is used by default
trans-unit.target: Path to CSS file (FE):CSS file that is used by default

trans-unit.source: Path to JavaScript file (FE):JavaScript file that is used by default
trans-unit.target: Path to JavaScript file (FE):JavaScript file that is used by default

trans-unit.source: Rating Values:Comma separated list of integer values that can be selected for the rating.
trans-unit.target: Rating Values:Comma separated list of integer values that can be selected for the rating.

trans-unit.source: Rating Reason Min. Value:If the selected rating exceeds this limit, then there is an obligation to select a reason.
trans-unit.target: Rating Reason Min. Value:If the selected rating exceeds this limit, then there is an obligation to select a reason.

trans-unit.source: Keep min. one search result:If this setting is `true`, then it is ensured that at least one result remains in the partner selection list, even if the entered string no longer leads to any results.
trans-unit.target: Keep min. one search result:If this setting is `true`, then it is ensured that at least one result remains in the partner selection list, even if the entered string no longer leads to any results.

trans-unit.source: Partner Label Fields:Comma-separated list of database fields to be used for forming the label of entries in the partner selection field. Fields that do not exist in the partner table are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Partner Label Fields:Comma-separated list of database fields to be used for forming the label of entries in the partner selection field. Fields that do not exist in the partner table are ignored.

trans-unit.source: Partner Label Field Split String:String used between label fields that are defined by `partnerLabelFields`.
trans-unit.target: Partner Label Field Split String:String used between label fields that are defined by `partnerLabelFields`.
